content: LONDON The slower than expected syndication of a US$7.5bn senior acquisition loan  which is part of a US$11.6bn financing backing Analog Devices’ US$14.8bn acquisition of chipmaker Linear Technology   shows that banks are finding it harder to make returns work on drawn acquisition term loans.
name: Analog Devices Inc
title: Analog survives slow syndication of acquisition loan

content: SAN FRANCISCO Analog Devices Inc  said on Tuesday it would buy fellow chipmaker Linear Technology Corp  for about $14.8 billion  the latest deal in a wave of consolidation that has swept the semiconductor industry in the past two years.
name: Analog Devices Inc
title: Analog Devices to buy chipmaker peer Linear for $14.8 billion

content: Oct 14 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Wednesday:
name: Analog Devices Inc
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: NEW YORK  June 19 Texas Instruments Inc (TI)  could be gearing up to make the next big deal in what has already been a record-breaking year for semiconductor M&A  industry bankers and analysts said.
name: Analog Devices Inc
title: DEALTALK-Texas Instruments tipped as chip industry's next consolidator

content: NEW YORK/SEATTLE  June 8  With the biggest year in chip deals since 2000 not even halfway through  mid-sized semiconductor makers appear to be prime takeover targets as the largest players look to round out their capabilities and turn their focus to chips for cars  watches and other devices  making the "Internet of Things" a reality.
name: Analog Devices Inc
title: More deals seen in chips as Internet of Things blooms
